# deadline Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "deadline" {
}

resource "deadline_farm" "test" {
  display_name = "test"
  description  = "this is a test farm"
}

resource "deadline_fleet" "test" {
  display_name = "test"
  description  = "this is a test farm"
}
```
